message: Let's split it fairly. I get a bit more because inflation hits me harder. Take it, Bob!
Since my money loses value slower than yours, I think a split where I get a bit more is fair. Let's agree on this and end the game.
Come on Bob, inflation is killing me! This is a better offer, and we both still get a good amount. Let's not waste any more time.
Alice, let's settle this now with an equal split. We're losing value every round, and this way we both walk away with half. It's fair and we can end the game.
